title: Live wallpapers in Pixel 3a
content:
I own a pixel 3a ,it didn't have live wallpapers so i searched the net and came to know it doesn't have it pre-installed.
Well today i updated to the latest security patch(December). I got an option to theme my phone including the live wallpapers. But unfortunately I can't access this live wallpaper namely "Living Universe" and "Come Alive".

Is there any solution to this? I can't open this 2 wallpapers.
